node.text: @scruffyknox 🙌
Love that they turned off their comments section on their insta. Must be getting a lot of heat, which is great! Blast them!

If you haven’t read @frickleshnicks post about @ilovejuicebar’s actions towards her and other female employees, we encourage you to do that now.
If you HAVE read it, and you’re equally disappointed in their initial actions and follow up reaction - here are some other places to get your juice:
🍓 @javajuicebox - pictured. All local and all delicious on North Broadway. @emstooks is there... a LOT😂
🍓 @earthfare - there’s one in both Bearden and Turkey Creek. Not local to Knoxville but Asheville’s kinda close, right?😏
🍓 @nekterjuicebar and @cleanjuiceturkeycreek are both chains - but they’re pretty adorable and delicious chains so we’re not mad😉😘
|
📸: @javajuicebox
|
EDIT: if you want to stay informed on how all of this unfolds, @nancyannmusic is doing a great job of posting updates about this story on her instagram story.

•
•
•
•
•
#knoxville #865 #coffee #igknoxville #madeintn #knoxvilletn #tennessee #lovewhereyoulive #865life #ilovelocalknoxville #new2knox #knoxrocks #juice #metoojuicebar #timesup #whyknox #scruffycity #easttennessee #visitknoxville #scruffyknox #thehappynow #knoxvegas #metoo #localknox #localknoxville #juicebar #keepknoxvillescruffy #love
@frickleshnicks you’re awesome, girl
So much thanks! 🙏
@sammi_bea_stone thanks for sharing!!
Thank you for this post! Shared!
@scruffyknox @new2knox can I get in on this hangout sesh!? I love me some Emilie(y)s!! And I want to meet Liz in real life!! ☺️
@scruffycityletters ahhh yessss💕
@scruffyknox 🙌
This is amazing! 🙌
@zachthetrainer thanks Zach!
Got my support and share .#womenempowerment
@actuallykenchildress that’s really kind of you to say! Excited for you to move back to Knox and see all the truly awesome local businesses that are still here☺️

Thank you so much for posting this!! I’ve been looking forward to hitting up @ilovejuicebar when I move back to Knox and have been horrified with the response. I love your page because it’s honest- so many influencers feel uncomfortable taking a stand- and really advocates for the best of Knox!
@laurennlewellen never been to that juice bar and now never will. Jfc. Meanwhile the smoothie bowls in that pic look so good.
@karlsbarkleyyy apparently its from jave juice box. I like want to go everyday. They look so yummy and healthy.
@karlsbarkleyyy
Thanks for this!!
Thank you for posting this @ilovejuicebar will definitely not be getting my business anymore
@javajuicebox 💗💗💗💗
Aaaahhh!!! We love them!!! 💓💓

I applaud you for posting this and bringing more awareness to it.  When I first heard about it I was really hoping that it was isolated to the two local locations (so they could take action against them) but after reading @ilovejuicebar reaction to it on @frickleshnicks post it really makes me believe this is not isolated.  The T-shirt that they wanted the staff to wear tells you it is not a "he said, she said". It is utilizing the Juice Bar logo so they either approved the design, which is egregious or they need to tell them not to use it which still does not address the actual issue.  You do not need the outline of a woman on a T-shirt saying "squeeze me" with a damn fruit that you don't even use on it. I feel for the staff and what they have gone through, hopefully they all quit and now have better employment, that will treat them like people.  I know I will NEVER have another Peanut butter & Jelly smoothie or anything else from another Juice Bar anywhere.
absolutely disgusting. thank you for sharing and bringing awareness. i will no longer support @juicebarknoxville @juicebar_turkeycreek
Thanks for sharing. I’ll never walk through those doors again
❤️🔥 Yes! It’s appalling.
May the fuckers go out of business.
I completely agree!! I was such a fan until I read the happenings. How, WHY, what even.

Love this. Can you also send out a reminder about Duck Donuts? Would be great for folks to give another donut shop their business following the awful animal abuse (murder) case the owner is involved with.
Love that they turned off their comments section on their insta. Must be getting a lot of heat, which is great! Blast them!
